product_name: Patagonia Cotton Minimalist Wavefarer Board Shorts - Men's
long_description: The retro-surf-inspired Patagonia Cotton Minimalist Wavefarer Board Shorts are made with a blend of organic cotton and nylon for excellent comfort and great durability. Durable water repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off. Inseam-free inner thigh construction eliminates chafing. Button-close back pocket is self draining and has an interior key loop. 3-piece, self-lined waistband contours the hip; flat-lying fly with single rubber button and drawstring closure.
short_description: The retro-surf-inspired Patagonia Cotton Minimalist Wavefarer Board Shorts are made with a blend of organic cotton and nylon for excellent comfort and great durability.
